history.proof: intros H. unfold FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM. unfold MM_PROBLEM in H. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment H : {n : nat & {_ : list (mm_instr (pos n)) & vec nat n}} H0 : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "(list (nat * nat) * {n : nat & vec nat n})%type".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
MM_PROBLEM -> FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM

Premises:
MM_PROBLEM = {n : nat & {_ : list (mm_instr (pos n)) & vec nat n}} : Set
FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM = (list (nat * nat) * {n : nat & vec nat n})%type : Set
FRACTRAN_ALT_HALTING = fun H : FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM => let (l, s) := H in let (n, v) := s in l /F/ ps 1 * exp 1 v ↓ : FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM -> Prop
MM_HALTING = fun P : MM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (P0, v) := s in sss_terminates (mm_sss (n:=n)) (1, P0) (1, v) : MM_PROBLEM -> Prop
MM_HALTS_ON_ZERO = fun P : MM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (P0, v) := s in sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) (1, P0) (1, v) (0, vec_zero) : MM_PROBLEM -> Prop
RingMicromega.eval_formula : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall E : Type, (BinNums.N -> E) -> (R -> E -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.Formula C -> Prop
RingMicromega.norm : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.Pol C
RingMicromega.negate : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> RingMicromega.Formula C -> RingMicromega.NFormula C
RingMicromega.eval_nformula : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.NFormula C -> Prop
RingMicromega.eval_pexpr : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall E : Type, (BinNums.N -> E) -> (R -> E -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> EnvRing.PExpr C -> R
RingMicromega.psub : forall C : Type, C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Pol C
RingMicromega.eval_op2 : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> RingMicromega.Op2 -> R -> R -> Prop
EnvRing.Psquare : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Pol C
RingMicromega.eval_pol : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.PolC C -> R
sums.mscal : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> nat -> X -> X
sss_output : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type), (instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) -> nat * list instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop
utils_list.iter : forall X : Type, (X -> X) -> X -> nat -> X
sss_terminates : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type), (instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) -> nat * list instr -> nat * data -> Prop
RingMicromega.Build_Formula : forall T : Type, EnvRing.PExpr T -> RingMicromega.Op2 -> EnvRing.PExpr T -> RingMicromega.Formula T
List.map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
RingMicromega.micomega_sor_setoid : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Equivalence req
RingMicromega.micomega_sor_setoid_Symmetric : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Symmetric req
OrderedRing.sor_setoid_Symmetric : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Symmetric req
RingMicromega.micomega_sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Reflexive req
OrderedRing.SORsetoid : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req
OrderedRing.Rneq_symm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n m -> ~ req m n
RingMicromega.eval_pol_norm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> forall (env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R) (lhs : EnvRing.PExpr C), req (RingMicromega.eval_pexpr rplus rtimes rminus ropp phi pow_phi rpow env lhs) (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env (RingMicromega.norm cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb lhs))
Inductive PExpr (C : Type) : Type := PEc : C -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEmul : EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEopp : EnvRing.PExpr C -> EnvRing.PExpr C | PEpow : EnvRing.PExpr C -> BinNums.N -> EnvRing.PExpr C Arguments EnvRing.PExpr _%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEc {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEX {C}%type_scope _%positive_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEadd {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEsub {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEmul {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEopp {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.PEpow {C}%type_scope _ _%N_scope
RingMicromega.eval_pol_sub : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> forall (env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R) (lhs rhs : EnvRing.Pol C), req (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env (RingMicromega.psub cO cplus cminus copp ceqb lhs rhs)) (rminus (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env lhs) (RingMicromega.eval_pol rplus rtimes phi env rhs))
Znumtheory.rel_prime_cross_prod : forall a b c d : BinNums.Z, Znumtheory.rel_prime a b -> Znumtheory.rel_prime c d -> BinInt.Z.gt b BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.gt d BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.mul a d = BinInt.Z.mul b c -> a = c /\ b = d
Relation_Definitions.relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Relation_Definitions.relation _%type_scope
RingMicromega.negate_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : BinNums.N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R), RingMicromega.SORaddon rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb cleb phi pow_phi rpow ->...-> ~ RingMicromega.eval_nformula rO rplus rtimes req rle rlt phi env (RingMicromega.negate cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb f)
RingMicromega.rlt_morph_Proper : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req iff)) rlt
RingMicromega.rle_morph_Proper : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req iff)) rle
RingMicromega.rminus_morph_Proper : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rminus
Inductive Pol (C : Type) : Type := Pc : C -> EnvRing.Pol C | Pinj : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Pol C | PX : EnvRing.Pol C -> BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Pol C Arguments EnvRing.Pol _%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.Pc {C}%type_scope Arguments EnvRing.Pinj {C}%type_scope _%positive_scope Arguments EnvRing.PX {C}%type_scope _ _%positive_scope
vec_map : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> forall n : nat, vec X n -> vec Y n
Inductive PExpr (C : Type) : Type := PEO : Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEI : Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEc : C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEX : BinNums.positive -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEadd : Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEsub : Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C | PEmul : Ring_polynom.PExpr C ->...-> Ring_polynom.PExpr C Arguments Ring_polynom.PExpr _%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEO {C}%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEI {C}%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEc [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEX _%type_scope _%positive_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEadd [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEsub [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEmul [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEopp [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PEpow [C]%type_scope _ _%N_scope
OrderedRing.Rle_ngt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rle n m < -> ~ rlt m n

OrderedRing.Rminus_eq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, req (rminus n m) rO < -> req n m
